description.p: Translator is a desktop application for translating text between multiple languages.

ul.li: Support for 15 languages (English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Arabic, Hindi, Dutch, Polish, Turkish)
Real-time translation as you type with debounced auto-translate
Dark/Light theme support
Copy translation to clipboard
Clear input text with one click
Swap source and target languages with text exchange
Character counter (max 5000 characters)
Non-blocking async translation via events

description.p: Version 0.2.0 introduces user experience improvements and new convenience features.

ul.li: Add Clear button to quickly clear input text and reset the translation
Improved language swap: now exchanges text content between input and output when swapping languages, making reverse translations easier
Added ESLint configuration for better code quality
Applied consistent code formatting across the codebase

description.p: First stable release of Translator application.

ul.li: Translation between 15 languages using trans command
Real-time translation with 500ms debounce
Dark/Light theme toggle
Copy translation to clipboard
Swap source and target languages
Character counter (5000 max)
Non-blocking async event-based translation
Flatpak and native Linux packages (DEB, RPM, AppImage)
